content: Short Period Rates for fourteen months Policy provides one hundred percent premium refund for coverage not exceeding thirty days, fifty percent premium refund for thirty one to ninety days coverage, twenty percent premium refund for ninety one to one hundred twenty days coverage, and zero percent premium refund for coverage exceeding one hundred twenty days.
questions: What is the premium refund for coverage not exceeding thirty days?
How much premium refund is provided for coverage between thirty one to ninety days?
Is there any premium refund for coverage exceeding one hundred twenty days?
What percentage of the premium is refunded for coverage lasting between ninety one to one hundred twenty days?
How long can a policy be covered to receive a one hundred percent premium refund?
What happens to the premium refund if the coverage lasts for more than one hundred twenty days?
Can you explain the refund structure for a fourteen months policy?
What is the minimum coverage duration to receive any premium refund?
How does the premium refund change as the coverage duration increases?
Is the premium refund policy the same for all types of coverage?
